mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, name, type, discount_amount AS discountAmount, min_price AS minPrice, expire_date AS expireDate, created_at AS createdAt FROM coupon ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon (name, type, discount_amount, min_price, expire_date) VALUES ( #{name}, #{type}, #{discountAmount}, #{minPrice}, #{expireDate})
